data.title: Don Davis - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Don Davis: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Most famous for his distinctive, atonal musical score for the popular film The Matrix (and its sequels), this cinematic composer also worked on The Good Life, Jurassic Park III, and numerous other movies. Also a television composer, he won Emmy Awards for his work on SeaQuest DSV and Beauty and the Beast.

Before Fame

After studying at the University of California-Los Angeles, he assisted television composer Mark Snow on the early 1980s series Hart to Hart. His first film score was written for the Wachowski brothers' 1996 thriller, Bound.

Trivia

His debut opera, RÃ­o de Sangre, premiered at Wisconsin's Florentine Opera Company in late 2010.

Family Life

He was born and raised in Anaheim, California. In the mid-1980s, he married Megan MacDonald.

Associated With
